The Rafina
Mediterranean Styled
Estate Home

This Mediterranean inspired custom luxury home was designed to give its owners maximum benefit from the pie shaped lot that overlooked a lake and 15th fairway beyond. The home plan’s casual yet elegant feel was designed to give its owners year round relaxed enjoyment.

LUXURY CUSTOM HOME THE Rafina

House Specifications:

Total Living: 6527 sq. ft.
First Floor Living: 4402 sq. ft.
Second Floor Living: 2125 sq. ft.

Width: 133 ft. 3 in.
Depth: 102 ft. 8 in.

Bedrooms: 4
Bathrooms: 4.5

BUILDER:
Kurtz Homes, Inc.

LANDSCAPE ARCHITECT:
WINDHAM STUDIOS

INTERIOR DESIGNER:
Accessories Etc.

PHOTOGRAPHER:
CJ WALKER

Remember, we can design a custom luxury home just for you. If you would like to chose a home plans from our extensive stock home plans visit our Sater Design Collection website where you can choose from more then 450 plans.
